Type.BattleDialog: I’ll beat these guys and prove myself to the operator.
I still have much to learn as a Grade 9 Fixer, but I hope to have a good fight nonetheless.
I’m afraid… But I wanna win.
Did I really win…? I made it! See, I can do it if I try.
I can’t wait to see the surprised look on operator’s face!
I… I didn’t want to die like this…
I just managed to become a Grade 9, too…
I-is it really okay to… keep going at this point…?
This… can’t be. It seems like we’re being overwhlemed… slowly…
My legs are quivering… What should I do? What am I supposed to…
I did it! I did it on my own!
Sorry…! But I have to win here.
We’re off to a good start! Let’s keep up the pace.
There’s no need to drag on any further. Let’s end this neatly.
Have the ones who came before us all died here?
They might not be as weak as they seem. We should stay alert.
Finn couldn’t even manage to complete such a simple job, huh?
We’ll be taking the goods you offered, then.
…I… I’ve lost…? …How disgraceful.
So I’m turning into a book as well… This isn’t what I expected.
Forget it. That one was too soft, anyway.
…I won’t fall back just because some lightweight died on me.
It’s much better to simply forget such things.
Done, who’s next?
Starting a fight with me was your last mistake.
Alright, I’m going to dispose of the rest of you in the same way.
She was so happy about becoming a Grade 8 Fixer too…
Aight, here comes an all out attack~ This one’s gonna hurt.
Hmph, think I’d lose against a gang of half-baked nerds like you?
You see, if anyone ever hits me, I hit ‘em twice to even up the score.
That was way too simple, wasn’t it?
Whatever we’re supposed to get here better be worth my time!
That’s… unfair! No… Why do I have to die like this!!!
I shouldn’t have followed Yun here… That asshole didn’t even help…!
Tsk, they were bound to die sooner or later…
What a bunch of unhelpful idiots!
…We’re not putting ourselves at a bigger risk here, are we?
Aren’t you too wide open?
See, there’s no way I can lose here.
That’s what you get for underestimating me. Sliced right in half~
You were so confident about this, you can’t just die on me and leave me here alone!
